page.shortlink: UX Repeating Sections Delete row dialog icon
page.description: The icon shown for the message box displayed when the user deletes a dirty row in a repeating section.
page.discussion: Specify the icon for the message box displayed when the user deletes a dirty row in a repeating section. Set to '<Specified by Style>' to use the icon specified in the UX Component's style.)
